name: NoiseMachine
0:
”Alexa, open noise machine”
”Alexa, start noise machine”
”Alexa, launch noise machine”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noise machine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Noise Machine has several tracks of mellow, relaxing, soothing white noise you can listen to when you or your baby are having a hard time sleeping.

Just open the skill, and one of the white noise tracks will play continuously for 2 hours.

If you want to try an alternate track, just say, "Alexa next" or "Alexa, previous" to load another white noise track.

Sweet dreams!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
